    • Method Detail

      • setCurrentUser

        public void setCurrentUser(java.lang.String s)
        Set current user method. Given an ID, it searches the users list and assigns the correct position of the user to the currentUser attribute.
        Parameters:
        s - ID of the current user.

      • getCurrentUser

        public User getCurrentUser()
        Getter of the current user.
        Returns:
        The current user.

      • addVideo

        public void addVideo(Video newVideo)
              throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Add new video method. Given a video, it adds it to the private repository of the current user.
        Parameters:
        newVideo - Video which will be added to the repository.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - It catches the exception from the method of privRep and throws it again.

      • addAudio

        public void addAudio(Audio newAudio)
              throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Add new audio file method. Given an audio file, it adds it to the private repository of the current user.
        Parameters:
        newAudio - Audio file which will be added to the repository.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - It catches the exception from the method of privRep and throws it again.

      • addImage

        public void addImage(Image newIm)
              throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Add new image method. Given an image, it adds it to the private repository of the current user.
        Parameters:
        newIm - Image which will be added to the repository.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - It catches the exception from the method of privRep and throws it again.

      • showPrivateRepository

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> showPrivateRepository()
        Show private repository method. It shows the files and its information inside the private repository of the current user.
        Returns:
        A list of String, each string from a different file.

      • showPublicRepository

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> showPublicRepository()
        Show public repository method. It shows the shared files and its information.
        Returns:
        A list of String, each string from a different file.

      • removeFile

        public void removeFile(int i)
                throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Remove file method. It removes the file in the given position od the Private Repository of the current user, as well as all the copies made in the Public Repository.
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the removed file.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - It catches the exception from the method of privRep and throws it again.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String nom,
                    java.lang.String ident)
             throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Add user method. It creates a new user and a new private repository associated with the user.
        Parameters:
        nom - Name of the new user.
        ident - ID of the new user.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - It catches the exception from the method of privRep and throws it again.

      • existUser

        public boolean existUser(java.lang.String string)
        Exist user method. It verifies if, given an ID, exists any user with such ID in the list.
        Parameters:
        string - ID to verify.
        Returns:
        Boolean type variable, true if there is a user with the given ID, false otherwise.

      • playMediaFile

        public void playMediaFile(int i)
                   throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Play media file method. It plays the file in the given position of the private repository of the current user.
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the played file.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - Exception thrown if the position selected doesn't exist or the file cannot be played.

      • shareMediaFile

        public void shareMediaFile(int i)
                    throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Share media file method. It shares to the public repository the file in the given position.
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the shared file in the private repository.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - Exception thrown if the position selected doesn't exist.

      • saveDataDisk

        public void saveDataDisk(java.lang.String string)
                  throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException,
                         java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Save data method. It saves the data in a file given its path.
        Parameters:
        string - Path of the file that will contain the data.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - App exception
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - File not found exception

                  throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException,

                         java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Load data method. It loads the data in a file given its path.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Data type object containing the loaded data.

        java.io.IOException - IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Class Not Found Exception

      • toString1

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> toString1()
        To string method. It shows the users and private repositories list, as well as the public repository.
        Returns:
        List of String containing all the information about the attributes of the Data-type object.

      • showMediaFile

        public void showMediaFile(int i,
                          int sec)
                   throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Show media file method. It shows the image in the given position of the private repository of the current user.
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the image.
        sec - Time (in seconds) that the image will be shown.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - It throws an exception if the file is not showable or it doesn't exist.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • playPrivateRepository

        public void playPrivateRepository()
                           throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Play private repository. It plays the repository, calling the method in the PlayListener.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - Thrown if the folder is empty.

      • playPublicRepository

        public void playPublicRepository()
                          throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Play public repository. It plays the repository, calling the method in the PlayListener.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - Thrown if the folder is empty.

      • setPlayerViewer

        public void setPlayerViewer(PlayerViewer pVi)
        Sets the player viewer of all the files in all the repositories. It is called in the load method.
        Parameters:
        pVi - PlayerViewer object.
